subject: Good day to you beloved ,
body:
Good day to you beloved ,
 I am pastor Donald Richardson , A Pastor with Faith Baptist Church | Queens New York, (Address 10501 37th Ave, Queens, NY 11368, United States
Phone: +1 718-457-5651)
 I am writing to you with a confidential business proposal that presents a unique opportunity for partnership in the transfer of a significant fund.
 I wish to seek your honorable assistance in transferring a sum of money (Eighteen Million, three Hundred Thousand United States Dollars) belonging to my deceased congregant, whom I operated/managed and guided on the operation of the account in which he deposited the huge sum of money with Bank of America New York but unfortunately, he was diagnosed with COVID 19 CORONA VIRUS which took his life afterwards on 25 August 2020.
 Are you in any way related to the deceased Surgeon ? I am contacting you particularly because you bear the same surname with the deceased.
 Kindly get back to me even though you are not related to the deceased so we can discuss .
 Get back to me to enable me to provide you with more information regarding this matter .
 May the Good Lord continue to bless and keep you and the Family.
 Sincerely
 Pastor Donald Richardson

subject: Re:    Good day to you beloved ,
body:
Hello Pastor Donald Richardson,

I hope this message finds you well. I must say, your message has certainly piqued my interest. It's not every day that one receives such a unique business proposal.

I'm sorry to hear about the passing of the individual who shares my surname. However, I can't recall any relatives who were surgeons or lived in New York. Could you perhaps share more details about this person? Maybe there's a distant connection that I'm unaware of.

Also, could you please elaborate on how exactly I can assist with the transfer of these funds? What would be required from me?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Shawna

subject: Re: Good day to you beloved ,
body:
Greetings  Sir

Thanks for your reply to my email . I appreciate it.

I  wish to inform you that my letter to you  is not intended to mock you in
any way , But  is to share the benefits of this mutually  beneficial
 transaction with you . I mean  every word stated in my  email to you and I
want you to treat this  matter  with all  amount of  Understanding and
seriousness  and love   .

I sincerely need your assistance and partnership for the transfer of the
US$18.3 Million US Dollars into any of your nominated bank accounts  .

The late deceased  *  Doctor  * shawna roberts  resident  in USA  was a
very good woman and philanthropist before his death , Even though you may
not be related to her ,  i  wish  to work  with you ,so i can  present you
as the legal next of kin of this project fund in the Bank of America
 hence you have same  names   ,To avoid this money been  remitted to
government escrow  reserve account as unclaimed funds  " while people are
suffering   and many Homeless in the street, hunger and starvation  and
war   .It's better this fund is released to you this 2024 than remain in
the bank .

All I need in this transaction is your trust and Honesty that you will not
seat nor divert or betray me as soon as this  fund is released to you as
next of kin of the  deceased  .

 My barrister Louis Barnard  will assist us to procure all the legal and
necessary documents needed by the Bank of America  to enable the bank  to
approve you as the next of kin of the deceased doctor . *Please note the
money will be shared 60% for me and 40% for you .*

I wish to use my share to help  poor people in this precarious time ,i also
intend to invest in many lucrative Business home and  abroad  , You can as
well insight me on your usage plan of your 40% of this fund so i can have a
clue of you type person and your call to earth .

I   have  scanned  and attached   the death certificate of the deceased
 and my passport copy  for your view  and documentation .This is to show
you I am serious and who I am .Please be truthful and transparent as I
don't want to be cheated when these funds get to you .

You can  reach any time on this number  +1(720)954-7294  (whats-app)

My Attorney will prepare all the necessary documents and affidavit which
will put you in place as the next of kin. The Attorney will draft and carry
out the notarization of the WILL and also obtain the necessary documents
and letter of probate/administration in your favor for the claim.

I promise to procure all the legal  documentation  for you and also  scan
and send all copies procured in your name to you , for your view and
documentation and guild accordingly as this transaction will be completed
in weeks  .As  soon as all the documents are ready then we  can  apply for
the release of funds to you  as next of kin .

Based on My religious ordination ,  I will never involve myself in any
business that will bring me problems or a bad reputation. I assure you that
this transaction  is legal and risk free  and you will never regret
assisting in this great venture now and in the future .

Feel free to ask me any questions   and think about this ---

I need you to send me these informations so i can discuss further with my
barrister and get back to you

I need you to send

Your full names :

Address to be contained in all the documents :

Your age ,Country of birth and occupation and telephone number

The barrister also needs these informations to fill in many relevant forms
in your favor

May God continue to bless and keep you  ,I wait to hear from you again  as
i will  also update you further

Sincerely

Pastor Donald  Richardson
